page.title: 20HOW WE DID THIS SURVEY-WALES
page.content: This survey was done by class five of Wales Junior School. We are all 9 & 10 years old.We started the survey in May 1985 & finished in July, although we did not work solidly on it. We began with the amenities counts & made several visits around the area. Each child had 2 or 3 amenities to count. This was quite hard going at times. We visited the library for information & used maps to help us. We did interviews with school children & with local people in order to collect our information together. It was difficult to write the text as we had so much to say in such a small space.We have done the writing by ourselves & our teacher helped us too. Doing this survey was not easy but it was fun. We hope that we shall be able to see the finished video disc when everything is completed.
